title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: A consistent discipline of learning and practicing is a true cure for ignorance and lack of confidence. However, letting the fear of failure shut down your progress as you pursue an interest is self-defeating. Its natural to wish you could just snap your fingers or take a pill and acquire instant knowledge of a subject. But if mastery of a skill was that easy, you would miss all the character-building lessons along the way. As you develop and grow, youre able to handle the mental and emotional responsibilities to excel. The discomfort you feel today will mold you into a wiser and stronger person tomorrow. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
